start

bootup

public List<? extends MobileBean> bootup()
Description copied from interface: Channel
Reads a subset of all Mobile Beans from the backend storage that are enough to get a service functional on the device. This saves against loading up lots of unnecessary beans on the storage constrained device. How many/which beans to return are totally at the discretion of the service being mobilized and could even contain all the beans on the server

Specified by:
bootup in interface Channel
Returns:
a list of mobile beans

readAll

public List<? extends MobileBean> readAll()
Description copied from interface: Channel

Specified by:

Returns:
a list of mobile beans
